review_text: We stayed here just prior to Labor Day weekend and found the property very well appointed, supplied and comfortable with a relaxing southwestern mission feel. The backyard space was used a lot in the evening and the AC kept the house comfy day and night during a pretty hot week. The hard wood floors were lovely but a bit creaky which didn’t bother us as we sleep with “waves” in the background. There was ample parking out front and it is on a fairly busy residential street so we were not in the front much having spent our outdoors time enjoying the backyard space. Street noise was not an issue for us. All in all a very pleasant experience and an awesome stay. Would definitely stay again!
